body: The premium only kits on walls  are violating the EULA standards, fix them ASAP
body_tagged: The premium only kits on walls  are violating the EULA standards, fix them ASAP
title: Sorry to be a partay pooper,

replies.body: How?
replies.body_tagged: How?

replies.body: Advantage of commands that give better advantages to donors. Access to stronger kits, etc. Basically, donor was supposed to be removed long ago.
replies.body_tagged: Advantage of commands that give better advantages to donors. Access to stronger kits, etc. Basically, donor was supposed to be removed long ago.

replies.body: Advantage of commands, special kits that non donators can't eventually get for free
replies.body_tagged: Advantage of commands, special kits that non donators can't eventually get for free

replies.body:
Hmmm, that's odd... You have 13 DAYS of play time, been here for more than a year, and then out of no where, you care...? 
Two ideas:
1) Attention seek much?
2) Too tired of losing to all the walls players who have put time and effor into the game and beat you all the time?

replies.body:
Mmmm, my point wasn't to be harsh. Literally the EULA hasn't been enacted on any servers, and it has no literal point. But, my point being, this guy has been around FAR long enough to have no good reason to ask about the EULA months after it happened.

And honestly, if Polar or Murph or Drake or any of those people are on, we all rekt.
